title: This Week

In the meantime, what was one small thing you did this weekend that made you or someone else smile, laugh, relax, or feel satisfied? After a productive day yesterday, I treated myself to the first episode of the new season of Silo, read Craig Modâ€™s Things Become Other Things for 30 minutes, and listened to James by Percival Everett on audiobook for 20 minutes.
